jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist
jobs.job_description:
We are seeking a Senior Data Scientist to join our AI team. You will work on cutting-edge machine learning projects, develop predictive models, and collaborate with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:
- Build and deploy machine learning models at scale
- Analyze large datasets using Python and SQL
- Collaborate with engineering teams to productionize models
- Present findings to stakeholders

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in data science
- Strong Python programming skills
- Experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch
- Excellent communication skills
- Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field

jobs.title: Data Scientist - ML Engineer
jobs.job_description:
Looking for a Data Scientist with strong ML engineering skills to build our recommendation system.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and implement recommendation algorithms
- Work with large-scale distributed systems
- Optimize model performance and latency
- A/B test new features

Qualifications:
- 3+ years in data science or ML engineering
- Proficiency in Python and Spark
- Experience with AWS cloud services
- Strong understanding of deep learning architectures

jobs.title: Junior Data Scientist
jobs.job_description:
Great opportunity for a junior data scientist to grow with a fast-paced startup.

What you'll do:
- Analyze customer data to derive insights
- Build predictive models using Python
- Create dashboards and visualizations
- Support senior data scientists on projects

Required Skills:
- 1-2 years of experience with data analysis
- Strong Python skills (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn)
- Knowledge of statistics and probability
- Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field
